creationView_requiredShareCountLabel: Number of shares needed for recovery
creationView_totalShareCountLabel: Total number of shares to create
creationView_dismissibleError_title: Something went wrong while sharing the secret
creationView_dismissibleError_secretFile: The secret file cannot be found. Make sure it exists and try again.
creationView_dismissibleError_outputDire: The output directory cannot be created.
The output directory already contains shares and/or a recovery scheme. Select a clean output directory and try again.
creationView_dismissibleError_cannotCrea: The share files cannot be created.
creationView_dismissibleError_cannotWrit: The share files cannot be written to.
creationView_dismissibleError_cannotCrea: The recovery scheme cannot be created.
creationView_dismissibleError_cannotWrit: The recovery scheme cannot be written to.
creationView_dismissibleError_secretFile: The secret file is too large. Select a smaller file and try again.
creationView_dismissibleError_filesystem: An unknown error occurred while accessing your files.
recoveryView_dismissibleError_title: Something went wrong while recovering the secret
recoveryView_dismissibleError_shareFileD: A share file cannot be found. Make sure all share files exist and try again.
recoveryView_dismissibleError_recoverySc: The recovery scheme file cannot be found. Make sure it exists and try again.
The recovery scheme file is corrupted.
recoveryView_dismissibleError_outputDire: The output directory cannot be created.
The output directory already contains a recovered secret. Select a clean output directory and try again.
recoveryView_dismissibleError_cannotCrea: The recovered secret file cannot be created.
recoveryView_dismissibleError_cannotWrit: The recovered secret file cannot be written to.
recoveryView_dismissibleError_recoveryFa: The recovery operation failed. Make sure you have supplied enough shares and try again.
recoveryView_dismissibleError_filesystem: An unknown error occurred while accessing your files.
